data.content: Fourth attempt: added zstyle list-colors entries for completion groups common-commands/other-commands to color command tokens green bold (help palette), switched display rows to left-padded command column for predictable coloring match, and inserted a cyan separator row between groups via compadd -x. Local checks: cargo test completions::tests::zsh_ passes; generated zsh script includes new styles and separator and passes zsh -n.
